resources.string: We pair old shoes to charities that can bring them to those who need them most.
Aditya and I, Binit, built this app because we noticed that in New England, there\'s a coat drive every winter, yet neither of us have ever seen a shoe drive.

But there\'s a huge demand for shoes. There\'s a need for winter boots in the colder regions. There\'s a need for regular sneakers by millions in third world countries. There\'s a need for fancy shoes at proms.

Charities can request certain types of shoes, while donators can either pick a request to fulfill or allow our algorithms to match their shoes to a charity. Charities are then noticed of the pick up location.
